import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {HttpClient} from "@angular/common/http"; import {ActivatedRoute, Router} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-customers', templateUrl: './customers.component.html', styleUrls: ['./customers.component.css'] }) export class CustomersComponent { customer :any; customerId!: number; constructor(private http:HttpClient, private router:Router) {} ngOnInit():void{ this.http.get("http://localhost:8888/CUSTOMER-SERVICE/customers").subscribe({ next : (data)=>{ this.customer=data; }, error:(err)=>{ } }) } getOrders(c: any) { this.router.navigateByUrl("/orders/"+c.id); } }
